__e: Then the colonel became part of an army that even today strives to protect our dreams so that we could live freely and simply and closer to the nature that we all love so much.
You will work freely now, and each of you will have a separate husband.
For once in my life I feel like there's something I can give myself freely to and I can expect the same in return.
I could have fun all night without hindrance, with no one to stop me.
I find people speak more freely without a superior officer around.
Permission to speak freely without you getting mad at me?
